list-item.p: Soil patch fragmentation remained almost unchanged during the decrease in rainfall from 1.2 mm/day to 1 mm/day, yielding a pattern of higher vegetation connectivity at 1 mm/day was than obtained at this rainfall level in the discrete experiment.
Labyrinth-like vegetation patch continuity was maintained despite a reduction in rainfall from 1 mm/day to 0.8 mm/day.
